associatedomain.name: AssociateDomain
associatedomain.description: Grants permission to associate a domain with an Amazon WorkLink fleet

associatewebsiteauthorizationprovider.name: AssociateWebsiteAuthorizationProvider
associatewebsiteauthorizationprovider.description: Grants permission to associate a website authorization provider with an Amazon WorkLink fleet

associatewebsitecertificateauthority.name: AssociateWebsiteCertificateAuthority
associatewebsitecertificateauthority.description: Grants permission to associate a website certificate authority with an Amazon WorkLink fleet

createfleet.name: CreateFleet
createfleet.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon WorkLink fleet

deletefleet.name: DeleteFleet
deletefleet.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon WorkLink fleet

describeauditstreamconfiguration.name: DescribeAuditStreamConfiguration
describeauditstreamconfiguration.description: Grants permission to describe the audit stream configuration for an Amazon WorkLink fleet

describecompanynetworkconfiguration.name: DescribeCompanyNetworkConfiguration
describecompanynetworkconfiguration.description: Grants permission to describe the company network configuration for an Amazon WorkLink fleet

describedevice.name: DescribeDevice
describedevice.description: Grants permission to describe details of a device associated with an Amazon WorkLink fleet

describedevicepolicyconfiguration.name: DescribeDevicePolicyConfiguration
describedevicepolicyconfiguration.description: Grants permission to describe the device policy configuration for an Amazon WorkLink fleet

describedomain.name: DescribeDomain
describedomain.description: Grants permission to describe details about a domain associated with an Amazon WorkLink fleet

describefleetmetadata.name: DescribeFleetMetadata
describefleetmetadata.description: Grants permission to describe metadata of an Amazon WorkLink fleet

describeidentityproviderconfiguration.name: DescribeIdentityProviderConfiguration
describeidentityproviderconfiguration.description: Grants permission to describe the identity provider configuration for an Amazon WorkLink fleet

describewebsitecertificateauthority.name: DescribeWebsiteCertificateAuthority
describewebsitecertificateauthority.description: Grants permission to describe a website certificate authority associated with an Amazon WorkLink fleet

disassociatedomain.name: DisassociateDomain
disassociatedomain.description: Grants permission to disassociate a domain from an Amazon WorkLink fleet

disassociatewebsiteauthorizationprovider.name: DisassociateWebsiteAuthorizationProvider
disassociatewebsiteauthorizationprovider.description: Grants permission to disassociate a website authorization provider from an Amazon WorkLink fleet

disassociatewebsitecertificateauthority.name: DisassociateWebsiteCertificateAuthority
disassociatewebsitecertificateauthority.description: Grants permission to disassociate a website certificate authority from an Amazon WorkLink fleet

listdevices.name: ListDevices
listdevices.description: Grants permission to list the devices associated with an Amazon WorkLink fleet

listdomains.name: ListDomains
listdomains.description: Grants permission to list the associated domains for an Amazon WorkLink fleet

listfleets.name: ListFleets
listfleets.description: Grants permission to list the Amazon WorkLink fleets associated with the account

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a resource

listwebsiteauthorizationproviders.name: ListWebsiteAuthorizationProviders
listwebsiteauthorizationproviders.description: Grants permission to list the website authorization providers for an Amazon WorkLink fleet

listwebsitecertificateauthorities.name: ListWebsiteCertificateAuthorities
listwebsitecertificateauthorities.description: Grants permission to list the website certificate authorities associated with an Amazon WorkLink fleet

restoredomainaccess.name: RestoreDomainAccess
restoredomainaccess.description: Grants permission to restore access to a domain associated with an Amazon WorkLink fleet

revokedomainaccess.name: RevokeDomainAccess
revokedomainaccess.description: Grants permission to revoke access to a domain associated with an Amazon WorkLink fleet

searchentity.name: SearchEntity
searchentity.description: Grants permission to list devices for an Amazon WorkLink fleet

signoutuser.name: SignOutUser
signoutuser.description: Grants permission to sign out a user from an Amazon WorkLink fleet

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add one or more tags to a resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags from a resource

updateauditstreamconfiguration.name: UpdateAuditStreamConfiguration
updateauditstreamconfiguration.description: Grants permission to update the audit stream configuration for an Amazon WorkLink fleet

updatecompanynetworkconfiguration.name: UpdateCompanyNetworkConfiguration
updatecompanynetworkconfiguration.description: Grants permission to update the company network configuration for an Amazon WorkLink fleet

updatedevicepolicyconfiguration.name: UpdateDevicePolicyConfiguration
updatedevicepolicyconfiguration.description: Grants permission to update the device policy configuration for an Amazon WorkLink fleet

updatedomainmetadata.name: UpdateDomainMetadata
updatedomainmetadata.description: Grants permission to update the metadata for a domain associated with an Amazon WorkLink fleet

updatefleetmetadata.name: UpdateFleetMetadata
updatefleetmetadata.description: Grants permission to update the metadata of an Amazon WorkLink fleet

updateidentityproviderconfiguration.name: UpdateIdentityProviderConfiguration
updateidentityproviderconfiguration.description: Grants permission to update the identity provider configuration for an Amazon WorkLink fleet
